pages.text: $(li)Cockroaches are tiny brown passive insects.$(br)$(li)If near light or they are near players, they will free.$(br)$(li)Cockroach may drop their Cockroach Wing Framgent on death.$(br)$(li)They can eat any food item dropped on the ground.
$(li)Do you want to teach your tiny cute Cuckroach to dance?$(br)$(li)Then give it a $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/maraca)Maraca!$(/l)
